result.execSummary:
The defendant Aaron Patrick Burks Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Court ordered defendant to pay a fine of $200.00 plus cost, fees, assessment and surcharges due by 5/18/2015. Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means. Defendant to make regular monthly payments. 
Defendant can ask for an extension and court will grant if monthly payments are made.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Aaron Patrick Burks in court with attorney Richard J. Johnson.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Sentencing Continued:  
The Court ordered the Defendant to serve 2 days in the House of Correction with credit for 2 days time served.    Time served disposition.
Court orders defendant to pay a fine of $200.00 plus cost, fees, assessment and surcharges due by 5/18/2015.  Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.  Defendant to make regular monthly payments.  Defendant can ask for an extension and court will grant if monthly payments are made.

07/15/2014

Defendant Aaron Patrick Burks in court with attorney Danielle Shelton for Richard J. Johnson.  Danielle E. Chojnacki for Dennis Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

NO FILE IN COURT.  Case heard for Br. 03.  Defendant appears in Court on a violation for a positive test for THC.   Defendant has been attending counseling at Family Focus and tested clean this morning.  Court finds the defendant is not in compliance with monitoring.  Court sets bail at $50 cash TOT to Justice Point same conditions.

Defendant Aaron Patrick Burks in court with attorney Mary D Scholle.  Stephan E Nolten appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Deputy Court Clerk:  ss

Case heard as to violation report.  Atty Scholle appears for atty Richard Johnson (who is in trial in another court).

Defendant is advised that any further violations may result in increased bail.    Court ordered the defendants supervision increased to "enhansed" supervision.  Case remains calendared for sentencing in Branch 3

Defendant Aaron Patrick Burks in court with attorney Richard J Johnson.  Dennis P Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Amended Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty.  

AS TO THE AMENDED INFORMATION:
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the Information/Complaint. Judgment of conviction entered.  Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing on 8/28/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  aw  Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 28, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Aaron Patrick Burks in court with attorney Richard J Johnson.  William Levins for Dennis P Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Fiorenza, Branch 03.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pleads not guilty. ADDRESS INFO for Aaron Patrick Burks Jr

Prior: 722 East Locust Boulevard, Milwaukee, WI 53202

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  Defendant to be monitored by drug testing.  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Aaron Patrick Burks in court with attorney Richard J Johnson.  Defendant Aaron Patrick Burks in custody.  Brittany C. Grayson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Fiorenza, Branch 03.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 24, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
